name: BLOODY TEARS 2
description:
Homage to the Retro days of games and inspired by cult classics that came before it Bloody tears 2 is a Metroidvania style action platformer!

--------

STORY

Year 1891-
In times past your great grandmother Marya Zaleska saved the lands from the Hordes and Curse by killing her fathers demonic spirit Dracula.
Upon defeating Dracula Marya shed bloody tears for the final death of her parents. 
But Not all was safe for Every 100 years Draculas Castle appears filled with demonic rage creating hordes of undead leaving nothing but blood in its wake.
To Stop this future Doom Marya turned her bloodline into the Legendary Hunter Clan of Zaleska.
Year 1991-
The time has come to fight again for Draculas curse and castle has been reawaken.
Vincent Zaleska Young Vampire hunter descendant of Marya.
It is your duty and birth rite to protect the lands.
Since a young age you have trained in hand to hand combat,weapons mastery,science,alchemy, black magic and demonic arts in order to hone your mind and body.
For you are the only hope of stopping the evil hordes and defeating the Curse of Dracula...

--------

 *3+ Biomes , *20+ Maps , *5+ Weapons , *5+ Enemy types and much more!

--------

I made this game in about a week or so for the game jam 

Indiepocalypse Issue #4   - (https://itch.io/jam/indiepocalypse-issue-4)
